name: Minor Cities Pack
description: Unlocked when all 9 minor cities are founded. Adds draft system and enhanced city mechanics.

data.title: Territory Draft
data.summary: Players draft starting territories instead of placing troops one at a time

draft_system.title: Draft System
draft_system.content: At game start, players draft territories in turn order until all starting territories are claimed.

rules.text: Players draft territories in turn order (fewest stars first)
Use snake draft: 1st→last, then last→1st, repeating

examples.explanation: Player A → B → C → C → B → A → A → B → C, etc.

changes.text: Each minor city provides +1 population for recruitment and may provide additional bonuses based on type
